title: Bottom of screen is flickering
body: Every so often the bottom half of the screen will flicker for a 1/2 second. This corresponds with me downloading a new NVIDIA driver yesterday, but every other game I've played since then is fine.

replies.body: give the real winner to the vs event

Since this just started happening after updating that driver, it may be related somehow. Check out the section of our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) going over **resetting your graphics card software** to see if that helps, but if not go through the rest of the guide as well and let me know if it helps.
